Title: Create valid user
Steps: 1. Navigate to the 'Users' page; 2. Click 'Add New User'; 3. Fill in 'Name' with 'John Doe'; 4. Fill in 'Email' with 'john.doe@example.com'; 5. Select role if applicable; 6. Click 'Submit'; 7. Verify confirmation modal appears; 8. Check user appears in the users list with correct details
Expected Result: User created successfully; confirmation message appears; user listed with correct info
Label: Users

Title: Create user without email
Steps: 1. Navigate to 'Users' page; 2. Click 'Add New User'; 3. Fill in 'Name' only; 4. Leave 'Email' blank; 5. Click 'Submit'; 6. Observe validation error; 7. Ensure no new user added
Expected Result: Error 'Email required' displayed; user not created
Label: Users

Title: Create user with duplicate email
Steps: 1. Navigate to 'Users'; 2. Click 'Add New User'; 3. Enter an existing email; 4. Click 'Submit'; 5. Observe message
Expected Result: Error 'Email already exists' displayed; user not created
Label: Users

Title: Update user name
Steps: 1. Navigate to 'Users'; 2. Search and open user profile; 3. Edit 'Name'; 4. Click 'Save'; 5. Verify success message; 6. Refresh list
Expected Result: User name updated; visible in users list
Label: Users

Title: Update user email
Steps: 1. Navigate to 'Users'; 2. Edit email field; 3. Save changes; 4. Check updated email in list
Expected Result: Email updated successfully; visible in users list
Label: Users

Title: Delete user
Steps: 1. Navigate to 'Users'; 2. Select user; 3. Click 'Delete'; 4. Confirm in modal; 5. Verify removal from list
Expected Result: User deleted; confirmation shown
Label: Users

Title: Delete non-existent user
Steps: 1. Attempt to delete user with invalid ID; 2. Observe message
Expected Result: Error 'User not found' displayed; list unchanged
Label: Users

Title: Upload valid PDF document
Steps: 1. Go to 'Documents'; 2. Click 'Upload'; 3. Select PDF file; 4. Choose user; 5. Submit; 6. Verify document appears in list
Expected Result: Document uploaded; visible in list; associated with correct user
Label: Documents

Title: Upload image document
Steps: 1. Upload JPG/PNG file; 2. Associate with user; 3. Submit
Expected Result: Document uploaded successfully; visible in documents list
Label: Documents

Title: Upload document without user
Steps: 1. Click 'Upload'; 2. Select file without user; 3. Submit
Expected Result: Error 'User_id required'; document not created
Label: Documents

Title: Retrieve document valid
Steps: 1. Open document details; 2. Verify file and user association
Expected Result: Document details correct; accessible for download
Label: Documents

Title: Retrieve document non-existent
Steps: 1. Attempt to access invalid document ID; 2. Observe error
Expected Result: Error 'Document not found'; list unchanged
Label: Documents

Title: Update document file name
Steps: 1. Open document; 2. Edit file name; 3. Save changes; 4. Verify updated name
Expected Result: File name updated; reflected in list
Label: Documents

Title: Update non-existent document
Steps: 1. Attempt to update invalid document; 2. Submit
Expected Result: Error 'Document not found'
Label: Documents

Title: Delete document valid
Steps: 1. Select document; 2. Click 'Delete'; 3. Confirm; 4. Verify removal
Expected Result: Document deleted; confirmation shown
Label: Documents

Title: Delete non-existent document
Steps: 1. Attempt deletion of invalid document; 2. Observe message
Expected Result: Error 'Document not found'; list unchanged
Label: Documents

Title: List all documents
Steps: 1. Navigate to documents list; 2. Observe all entries
Expected Result: All documents displayed correctly
Label: Documents

Title: Start KYC valid
Steps: 1. Navigate to KYC; 2. Select user; 3. Click 'Start KYC'; 4. Fill required fields; 5. Submit; 6. Check pending status
Expected Result: KYC started; status pending; visible in list
Label: KYC

Title: Start KYC non-existent user
Steps: 1. Start KYC with invalid user ID; 2. Submit
Expected Result: Error 'User not found'; no KYC created
Label: KYC

Title: Start KYC missing data
Steps: 1. Start KYC leaving mandatory fields blank; 2. Submit
Expected Result: Error 'Required fields missing'; KYC not created
Label: KYC

Title: Retrieve KYC valid
Steps: 1. Open KYC details; 2. Verify user and status
Expected Result: KYC details correct; status pending
Label: KYC

Title: Retrieve KYC non-existent
Steps: 1. Attempt to retrieve invalid KYC; 2. Observe error
Expected Result: Error 'KYC not found'
Label: KYC

Title: Finalize KYC approved
Steps: 1. Open KYC; 2. Click 'Approve'; 3. Confirm; 4. Verify status update
Expected Result: KYC status approved; visible in list
Label: KYC

Title: Finalize KYC rejected
Steps: 1. Open KYC; 2. Click 'Reject'; 3. Confirm; 4. Verify status update
Expected Result: KYC status rejected; visible in list
Label: KYC

Title: Finalize non-existent KYC
Steps: 1. Attempt to approve/reject invalid KYC; 2. Observe error
Expected Result: Error 'KYC not found'
Label: KYC

Title: List KYC users
Steps: 1. Navigate to KYC list; 2. Observe all entries
Expected Result: All KYC records displayed
Label: KYC

Title: Filter KYC by pending
Steps: 1. Navigate to KYC list; 2. Apply filter 'Pending'; 3. Verify list
Expected Result: Only pending KYC displayed
Label: KYC

Title: Integration user + document
Steps: 1. Create user; 2. Upload document for that user; 3. Verify association
Expected Result: Document linked correctly to user
Label: Integration

Title: Integration user + KYC
Steps: 1. Create user; 2. Start KYC for that user; 3. Verify status
Expected Result: KYC linked to user; status pending
Label: Integration

Title: Integration full flow
Steps: 1. Create user; 2. Upload document; 3. Start KYC; 4. Verify IDs and links
Expected Result: All steps succeed; all entities correctly linked
Label: Integration

Title: Delete user with documents
Steps: 1. Attempt to delete user with documents; 2. Observe message
Expected Result: Error 'User has associated documents'; user not deleted
Label: Users

Title: Update KYC already finalized
Steps: 1. Attempt to change status; 2. Submit
Expected Result: Error 'KYC already finalized'; status unchanged
Label: KYC

Title: Upload invalid file type
Steps: 1. Upload .exe or unsupported file; 2. Submit
Expected Result: Error 'Invalid file type'; document not created
Label: Documents

Title: Retrieve documents filtered by user
Steps: 1. Apply filter by user; 2. Verify list
Expected Result: Only documents for selected user displayed
Label: Documents

Title: Multi-step error scenario
Steps: 1. Create user; 2. Upload document with invalid user; 3. Start KYC with invalid user
Expected Result: User created; document/KYC fail with correct error messages
Label: Integration

Title: UI validation messages
Steps: 1. Leave mandatory fields blank in user form; 2. Observe tooltips/messages
Expected Result: Validation messages displayed correctly; UX consistent
Label: UI

Title: Check responsive layout
Steps: 1. Open UI in desktop, tablet, mobile sizes; 2. Observe layout and element alignment
Expected Result: UI adapts correctly; no broken layout
Label: UI

Title: Check error modals
Steps: 1. Trigger validation errors; 2. Observe modals
Expected Result: Error modals displayed; close button works; messages readable
Label: UI

Title: Performance - load users list
Steps: 1. Navigate to users list; 2. Measure loading time
Expected Result: List loads under expected threshold; no errors
Label: Performance

Title: Performance - upload document
Steps: 1. Upload 5MB file; 2. Measure upload time and observe UI
Expected Result: Upload completes under threshold; UI responsive; document listed
Label: Performance
